citations.narrative:
The licensee is not following the Program of Vet Care for vaccinations. Of the 122 adult dogs, 20 are not up to date on
one or more vaccines required by the Animal Welfare Act (rabies, distemper, and parvovirus). The current Program of Vet
Care prescribes for the rabies and distemper/parvovirus (D/P) vaccines to be given yearly.
** The following 5 dogs have no history of vaccinations for distemper, parvovirus, or rabies:
- Adult female Cavapoo “Jane” #4736
- Adult female Cavapoo “Haven” #4743
- Adult female YorkiePoo “Cindy” #4307
- Adult female Havanese “Cindy” #4819
- Adult female Poodle “Peggy” #4479
** The following 3 dogs have no history of receiving a rabies vaccine, and the distemper/parvovirus (D/P) vaccine is
overdue:
- Adult male Poodle “Lincoln/Rowdy” #2680: There is no history of rabies vaccine. The last D/P vaccine was given on
4/13/22 and was due on 4/13/23. The D/P vaccine is approximately 1 year overdue.
- Adult female Poodle “Lady/Lou” #2680: There is no history of rabies vaccine. The last D/P vaccine was given on 4/13/22
and was due on 4/13/23. The D/P vaccine is approximately 1 year overdue.
- Adult female Cavapoo “Jane” #4736: There is no history of rabies vaccine. The last D/P vaccine was given on 7/23/22
and was due on 7/23/23. The D/P vaccine is approximately 10 months overdue.
** The following 6 dogs are overdue on the distemper/parvovirus (D/P) vaccines:
- Adult female Cavapoo “Lena” #4735 last received the D/P vaccine on 4/16/22 and was due on 4/16/23. The D/P vaccine
is 1 year and 1 month overdue.
- Adult female Cavalier “Ruby” #4728 last received a D/P vaccine on 1/29/23 and was due on 1/28/24. The D/P vaccine is
3.5 months overdue.
- Adult female Cavalier “Lassie” #4729 last received a D/P vaccine on 1/29/23 and was due on 1/28/24. The D/P vaccine
is 3.5 months overdue.
- Adult female Poodle “Jeri” #4314 last received a D/P vaccine on 1/29/23 and was due on 1/28/24. The D/P vaccine is
3.5 months overdue.
- Adult female Goldendoodle “Iylie” #1588 last received a D/P vaccine on 5/1/23 and was due on 5/1/24. The D/P vaccine
is 2 weeks overdue.
- Adult female Pomeranian “Emma” #4251 last received a D/P vaccine on 5/1/23 and was due on 5/1/24. The D/P vaccine
is 2 weeks overdue.
** The following 3 dogs have no history of distemper/parvovirus (D/P) vaccination:
- Adult female Poodle “Jill” #4740
- Adult female Maltipoo “Grace” #4461
- Adult female Cavapoo “Betty” #5581
** The following dog has no history of rabies vaccination: Adult female Goldendoodle Katelyn #4726.
** The following dog has a history of receiving the rabies vaccine but is now overdue: Adult female Cavalier “Kathy” #4725
last received a rabies vaccine on 6/6/22 and was due on 6/6/23. The rabies vaccine is 11 months overdue.
** The following dog has a history of the rabies, distemper, and parvovirus vaccines but is now overdue for all three: Adult
male Poodle “Kyle” #9098 last received a D/P and rabies vaccines on 5/3/23 and was due on 5/3/24. The vaccines are 2
weeks overdue.
Distemper, parvovirus, and rabies are life-threatening diseases, and, if contracted, may cause pain, distress, and
suffering. Correct by vaccinating for distemper, parvovirus, and rabies in accordance with a schedule approved by the
Attending Veterinarian and vaccine manufacturer recommendations. Correct by May 30, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative and the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3)  Repeat
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The licensee is not following the Program of Vet Care for vaccinations. Of the 122 adult dogs, 20 are not up to date on 
one or more vaccines required by the Animal Welfare Act (rabies, distemper, and parvovirus). The current Program of Vet 
Care prescribes for the rabies and distemper/parvovirus (D/P) vaccines to be given yearly.  
 
** The following 5 dogs have no history of vaccinations for distemper, parvovirus, or rabies: 
- Adult female Cavapoo “Jane” #4736 
- Adult female Cavapoo “Haven” #4743 
- Adult female YorkiePoo “Cindy” #4307 
- Adult female Havanese “Cindy” #4819 
- Adult female Poodle “Peggy” #4479 
 
** The following 3 dogs have no history of receiving a rabies vaccine, and the distemper/parvovirus (D/P) vaccine is 
overdue:  
- Adult male Poodle “Lincoln/Rowdy” #2680: There is no history of rabies vaccine. The last D/P vaccine was given on 
4/13/22 and was due on 4/13/23. The D/P vaccine is approximately 1 year overdue.  
- Adult female Poodle “Lady/Lou” #2680: There is no history of rabies vaccine. The last D/P vaccine was given on 4/13/22 
and was due on 4/13/23. The D/P vaccine is approximately 1 year overdue.  
- Adult female Cavapoo “Jane” #4736: There is no history of rabies vaccine. The last D/P vaccine was given on 7/23/22 
and was due on 7/23/23. The D/P vaccine is approximately 10 months overdue. 
 
** The following 6 dogs are overdue on the distemper/parvovirus (D/P) vaccines: 
- Adult female Cavapoo “Lena” #4735 last received the D/P vaccine on 4/16/22 and was due on 4/16/23. The D/P vaccine 
is 1 year and 1 month overdue.  
- Adult female Cavalier “Ruby” #4728 last received a D/P vaccine on 1/29/23 and was due on 1/28/24. The D/P vaccine is 
3.5 months overdue.  
- Adult female Cavalier “Lassie” #4729 last received a D/P vaccine on 1/29/23 and was due on 1/28/24. The D/P vaccine 
is 3.5 months overdue.  
- Adult female Poodle “Jeri” #4314 last received a D/P vaccine on 1/29/23 and was due on 1/28/24. The D/P vaccine is 
3.5 months overdue.

- Adult female Goldendoodle “Iylie” #1588 last received a D/P vaccine on 5/1/23 and was due on 5/1/24. The D/P vaccine 
is 2 weeks overdue.  
- Adult female Pomeranian “Emma” #4251 last received a D/P vaccine on 5/1/23 and was due on 5/1/24. The D/P vaccine 
is 2 weeks overdue. 
 
** The following 3 dogs have no history of distemper/parvovirus (D/P) vaccination: 
- Adult female Poodle “Jill” #4740  
- Adult female Maltipoo “Grace” #4461  
- Adult female Cavapoo “Betty” #5581  
 
** The following dog has no history of rabies vaccination: Adult female Goldendoodle Katelyn #4726.  
 
** The following dog has a history of receiving the rabies vaccine but is now overdue: Adult female Cavalier “Kathy” #4725 
last received a rabies vaccine on 6/6/22 and was due on 6/6/23. The rabies vaccine is 11 months overdue.  
 
** The following dog has a history of the rabies, distemper, and parvovirus vaccines but is now overdue for all three: Adult 
male Poodle “Kyle” #9098 last received a D/P and rabies vaccines on 5/3/23 and was due on 5/3/24. The vaccines are 2 
weeks overdue. 
 
Distemper, parvovirus, and rabies are life-threatening diseases, and, if contracted, may cause pain, distress, and 
suffering. Correct by vaccinating for distemper, parvovirus, and rabies in accordance with a schedule approved by the 
Attending Veterinarian and vaccine manufacturer recommendations. Correct by May 30, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative and the licensee. 
 
 n
